titleStmt.title: Hermes Mercurius Trismegistus his Divine pymander in seventeen books : together with his second book called Asclepius, containing fifteen chapters with a commentary / translated formerly out of the Arabick into Greek, and thence into Latine, and Dutch, and now out of the original into English by Dr. Everard.
Poemander. English. 1657
titleStmt.author: Hermes, Trismegistus.
Everard, John, 1575?-1650?
Hermes, Trismegistus. Hermes Trismegistus his second book called Asclepius.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.S. for Thomas Brewster,

notesStmt.note: "Hermes Trismegistus his second book called Asclepius" has special t.p. and pagination.
